module.name: Call Recording
module.description: Provides much of the call recording functionality.
module.changelog: *13.0.11.4* FREEPBX-14471 Bulk Import/Export of DIDs does not include call recording setting *13.0.11.3* FREEPBX-13941 Call Recording Mode "Yes" and "No" not working *13.0.11.2* FREEPBX-14343 Issue while adding Call Recording *13.0.11.1* FREEPBX-13997 callrecording should locate php scripts via variable *13.0.11* FREEPBX-11526 Allow setting Call Recording beep to 0 to disable *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10860 append "now" to callfile in CDR *13.0.9* Change interpreter path to use "/usr/bin/env php" *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11055 *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10765 FREEPBX-10753 *13.0.6* Add slideout menu and BMO search provider *13.0.5* Change advanced settings text *13.0.4* Fix issue with One-Touch not picking up the Origination correctly. *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9901 system becomes unresponsive *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha5* Visual styling fixes *13.0.1alpha4* Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for callrecording *13.0.1alpha3* FREEEPBX-8870 Utilize new Asterisk 13 MixMonitor Option (Recording Beep) *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.1.2* #8298 *12.0.1.1* Handle old 'delayed' entry *12.0.1* Significant changes to the way Call Recordings work. See wiki. *2.11.0.7* #7315 *2.11.0.6* Generate License file *2.11.0.5* Use abstracted function for last insert id *2.11.0.4* #6914, PBXAC-13 *2.11.0.3* #6766 (fixes regression from #6708) *2.11.0.2* #6708 *2.11.0.1* #6051 *2.11.0.0* #5909 outbound route recording settings *2.10.0.2* add mgr script for one-touch-record *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* New Module
